thread.title: Leading ivory trade investigator found dead in Kenya

title: Leading ivory trade investigator found dead in Kenya
text:
Leading ivory trade investigator found dead in Kenya 11:48am EST - 01:18 
A prominent American investigator of the illegal ivory and rhino horn trade has reportedly been found dead in his Nairobi home, just before he was expected to publish a new expose on Asia's influence. Matthew Larotonda reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A prominent American investigator of the illegal ivory and rhino horn trade has reportedly been found dead in his Nairobi home, just before he was expected to publish a new expose on Asia's influence. Matthew Larotonda reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2nJLG0l
